attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: Arced projectile that generates a spell field upon impact

spell2.name: UNBEATABLE SQUIRREL TSUNAMI
spell2.description: Summon a horde of squirrels to charge forward, dealing damage while bouncing against structures

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: The squirrels will rush towards the nearest enemy after bouncing instead of bouncing randomly

spell3.name: TAIL BOUNCE
spell3.description: Rocket upwards with a bounce of her tail

spell4.name: MAMMAL BOND
spell4.description: Reload Burst Acorns and can use an ability without cooldown once in a short duration

spell5.name: SQUIRREL BLOCKADE
spell5.description: Launch an acorn to unleash Squirrel Guards, Imprisoning the first hit enemy

attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: Charged projectile with an arced trajectory

attributes.label: PROJECTILE SPEED
attributes.value: 20 - 60 m/s (Maximum speed is achieved after 0.7s of charging)
